ingredients.ingredient: 4 large portobello mushroom cups, gills removed
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 cups sliced fresh mozzarella cheese, divided

cookingTips: Remove the dark gills from the mushrooms to prevent excess moisture during cooking
Brush mushrooms with oil and season before roasting to build flavor
Use fresh mozzarella rather than shredded for better melting and a creamier texture
